name: evidently-input
description: TypeScript powered for easily handling input in your games.

scripts.test: nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r test/hookJsdom.js --require source-map-support/register test/**/*.test.*
scripts.test-watch: nyc node_modules/.bin/mocha -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r test/hookJsdom.js --require source-map-support/register test/**/*.test.* --watch --extension ts,js,json
scripts.prepare-publish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run docs

author: Maurycy Zarzycki (Evidently Cube)
